##Task 2
```{r}
plot(1, xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0,100), type="n")
points(c(20,60),c(60,60),pch=9)
lines(c(20,60),c(60,60))
lines(c(20,20),c(60,0))
lines(c(60,60),c(60,0))
```

## Task 3
```{r}
plot(1, xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0,100), type="n")
xx=seq(0,2*pi,by=0.001)
x1=50+20*cos(xx)
y1=60+20*sin(xx)
points(x1,y1,pch=1)
```
